abstract: The bank would pay $410 million to settle a class-action stemming from charges collected from customers overdrawing their accounts.
snippet: The bank would pay $410 million to settle a class-action stemming from charges collected from customers overdrawing their accounts.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America would pay $410 million to settle its piece of a broad lawsuit involving excessive overdraft fees on debit cards in a deal tentatively approved by a federal judge in Miami on Monday.

headline.main: Bank of America to Settle Overdrafts Suit for $410 Million
headline.print_headline: Bank of America to Settle Overdrafts Suit for $410 Million
